scraping module¶

scraping.get_idol_links(url: str, idol: str = '') → list[source]¶

get character page links with a href tag. if not set idol name, get all links.

Parameters

  • url (str) – web page url

  • idol (str, optional) – idol name, defaults to ‘’

Returns

links from url

Return type

list

Examples

>>> get_idol_links('https://imas.gamedbs.jp/mlth/', '白石 紬')
['https://imas.gamedbs.jp/mlth/chara/show/51']
scraping.get_title(url: str) → str[source]¶

get web page title with h1 tag.

Parameters

url (str) – web page url

Returns

title of web page

Return type

str

Examples

>>> get_title('https://million-comments.herokuapp.com/')
<h1>ログイン</h1>
